alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued May 29 at 9:16AM PDT until May 29 at 11:00AM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of north central Oregon, including the following area, Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. Creeks and streams may rise out of their banks. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Periods of moderate rain will continue into this afternoon. This will cause rises on area streams and creeks. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Southern Blue Mountains of Oregon
